scripts.build-css: node-sass --include-path --source-map scss public/sass/light-theme.sass public/css/light.css && node-sass --include-path --source-map scss public/sass/dark-theme.sass public/css/dark.css
scripts.post-css: npx postcss public/css/light.css --use autoprefixer cssnano -o public/css/light.min.css && npx postcss public/css/dark.css --use autoprefixer cssnano -o public/css/dark.min.css
scripts.watch-css: nodemon -e sass -x "npm run build-css && npm run post-css"
